c:facetType.name: MultiExtensionPointsFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the multi-chart extension points facet.

c:property.name: smallBase
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the base (root) panel of the small charts.

c:property.name: smallContent
c:property.c:documentation:
The extension point of the content panel of the small charts.
The content panel is a child of the base panel.

c:property.name: multiChartOverflowMarker
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the multi-chart overflow/clip marker.
